customErrorMessages.errorMessage: Milestone with the same vehicle and same service type are already exists.

Flow.description: 16-04-2024 - This flow will be used to create 3 Milestones (3,6 and 12 Months) for Service Remainders. 21-04-2024 - This flow will be used to create 12 Milestones (1 to 12 Service) for Service Remainders. 08-05-2024 - This flow will be used to create 13 to 18 Milestones (13 to 18) for Service Reminders. 13-05-2024 - Add Error msg while creation is not done successfully.
Flow.label: Create Asset Milestones
